languageTools.program.agent

Class NameSpace.Store<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • languageTools.program.agent.NameSpace.Store<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the items stored in the store.
    Enclosing class:
    NameSpace

    public class NameSpace.Store<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores items of type T in a LinkedHashMap. The intended use is to store action specifications, modules, and macros in the store using their signatures as keys.
    Author:
    K.Hindriks

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Detail

      • clone

        public NameSpace.Store<T> clone()
        Returns a clone of this NameSpace.Store. Note that items in the store are not cloned!
        Overrides:
        clone in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        A clone of this store.

      • getItems

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<T>> getItems()
        Returns the map of items.
        Returns:
        A map of all items in the store.

      • getItemList

        public java.util.List<T> getItemList()
        Returns an iterator over the items in this NameSpace.Store.
        Returns:
        Iterator over the items in this store.

      • add

        public void add(T item,
       java.lang.String signature)
        Adds an item to the store.
        Parameters:
        item - The item to be added.
        signature - The signature of the item, i.e. string of the form {item name}/{nr of parameters of item}.

      • inherit

        public void inherit(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<T>> content,
           boolean override)
        See NameSpace.inherit(NameSpace, boolean).
        Parameters:
        content - The content that is to be inherited by this store.
        override - Flag that indicates whether content of this store overrides that of the given (parameter) content.
